March.notes: sionals from all different industries (healthcare, science, etc) to pitch ideas for students to work on.

March.title: Hack the Fog
March.notes: Hack the Fog is organized by a group of dedicated high school students who believe hackathons should be accessible and inclusive to everybody.

March.title: RevolutionUC Spring 2018
March.notes: RevolutionUC is a student hackathon where we invite students from across the midwest to partake in a weekend of code, community, and self-improvement. You don’t have to have to be a computer science major or engineering student to attend. It’s a learning experience for students of all skill levels and open to all high school and college students!

March.title: DataHack Premier League
March.notes: Analytics Vidhya presents the largest sports analytics competition - the DataHack Premier League! Use your data science skills to navigate through ball-by-ball action to predict the highest run getter and the highest wicket taker in each game of Indian Premier League (IPL) 2018. Prizes worth ruppees INR 300,000 up for grabs so step on to the pitch and smash your way to the top!

March.title: McKinsey Analytics Online Hackathon- Recommendation Design
March.notes: Participate in a McKinsey Analytics Hackathon where you will have the opportunity to experience and overcome some of the challenges that leading global organizations face. The best participants will be short listed for interviews with us and additionally the winner will receive an all-expenses paid trip to an international analytics conference of your choice as a McKinsey guest, subject to visa approval and ticket availability.

March.title: Hack in the North 3.0
March.host: Indian Institute of Information Technology, Allahabad
March.notes: Consensys presents Hack in the North 3.0 - the third iteration of the annually held student hackathon of IIIT Allahabad. With 300 participants from the prestigious institutions all over India, we have some amazing talent put to best use for 36 hours straight in order to create ideas helpful to th society. Having prizes worth 20 Lakh, we have something for everyone. We also have mentors coming in from US to help participants enhance their ideas.

March.title: Lord of the Machines: Data Science Hackathon
March.notes: Analytics Vidhya is hosting - Lord of the Machines, a data science / machine learning hackathon designed to discover the best data scientists in the community. In this two-day hackathon, participants will have the opportunity to come up with innovative and exciting data science solutions to claim your supremacy.Winners will have a chance to win Prizes worth INR 130,000.
